DOC.brief_summary: Ask the 4 carers of children with Prader-willi syndrome to disclose their experiences and difficulties for searching better management and intervention
DOC.brief_title: Exploring Stress and Coping Behaviors of the Major Carer Whose Children With Prader-Willi Syndrome
DOC.criteria: a person who care and live with children with PraderWilli syndrome siblings or lesscontact family teachers
